ingredients: 3 cups cubed (1-inch) seedless watermelon, 1 large white peach, pitted and cut into small cubes, 1 large nectarine, pitted and cut into small cubes, 1  black plum, pitted and cut into small cubes, 1 cup fresh blueberries,   +   1/2 cup seedless red grapes, halved,   +   1/2 cup shredded coconut, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 cup nondairy whipped topping (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 2%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Sodium 11mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 12g 4%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 9g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 7mg 36%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 140mg 3%
